title: The Choice is yours (Industrial safety)
creator_credit: Drayton Film Productions, Ken Daley, John Ward, Colin Fox and Erika Hellfritsch
brief_description: Considers the problems of industrial safety on civil engineering construction sites. Makes the point that it is not the obviously risky jobs and locations that cause the majority of accidents but simple carelessness. Reconstructs accidents, and stresses the value of goggles.
